ClimateQuery.title: global mean temperature
ClimateQuery.comments: Returns global mean surface temp anomaly relative to the 1850-1900 mean. Also available is global mean air temperature; in both climate model native or relative to 1850-1900 mean. A user can adjust the query to search for any of: * global-mean-surface-temperature * global-mean-air-temperature * global-mean-surface-temperature-native * global-mean-air-temperature-native
